features: 【 Premium Area Rugs 】- FALARK soft area rug is made of newly upgraded velvet and quick-rebound thickened sponge interlayer, providing a smooth and ultra soft touch. And the environmental protection materials of our fluffy rugs are safe and friendly to kids and pets

【Latex Non-Slip Backing】 - Our shag carpets have thousands of latex anti slip dots regularly distributed at the bottom, increasing the friction between the carpet and the floor, making it safer for you to walk on. Non woven backing can effectively avoid damage to the floor

【No Shedding or Fading】- Our plush rugs use improved weaving technology and advanced dyeing technology to firmly embed the pile into the sponge pad, ensuring long-term use without shedding or fading, which are durable even in areas with high pedestrian traffic

【Perfect Home Decor】 - We offer various colors and sizes of furry rugs based on the color preferences and size needs of most consumers. They are suitable for bedroom, living room, kids' room, nursery, playrooms... FALARK rug is the perfect choice for your room decoration

【Easy to clean】- We recommend wiping with a damp cloth or vacuum cleaning for a small amount of dirt. Hand washing is advised to extend the lifespan of the carpet. If machine washing is required, please put it in a laundry bag. Please air dry naturally after washing
body.description: FALARK Area Rugs - The perfect choice for home decor FALARK rugs cater to modern indoor minimalist decor and are dedicated to creating premium plush area rugs that are loved by all ages. About Our Shag Rugs 1. The materials used in our furry rugs allow children or pets to use them with confidence. 2. We adopt an upgraded processing technology to make our carpets more durable, with no shedding or fading of the fluff, and no warping of the edges. 3. The soft velvets relax and warm your feet, the thickened sponge pad provides sound insulation effect, the non-woven backing protects your floor, and latex particles protect you from slipping. 4. Our shaggy rugs are machine washable, but we suggest putting them in a laundry bag or hand washing to extend their lifespan. Shopping Tips 1. Our fluffy carpets are vacuum packaged and may have some creases upon received, but the creases will disappear after 2-3 days of lying flat 2. Due to compression transportation, the carpet may appear a bit thin at first. Don't worry, it will return to a fluffy state after 2-3 days. You can also use a hair dryer to fluff the carpet up faster. 3. When opening the packaging, the carpet may emit some odor, which is a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage. Please leave it in a well ventilated place for 1-2 days, and the odor will dissipate. Any other questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Silky and soft but slippery
reviews.reviewText: This rug is super silky and soft - almost too silky. In bare feet, socks, and even some shoes it feels slippery to walk on. I love everything else about this rug. It doesn't slide on the actual floor, just your feet slip on the surface. It fluffed up quickly upon opening, it doesn't shed, is easy to vacuum, is soft and cushy, and looks luxurious. I would recommend putting it under a chair or near a bed where your feet can feel it when you touch the floor, but you don't have to walk far.
